entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
